package.name: BytaFont 3 (iOS 11)
package.shortDescription: BytaFont 3 lets you apply fonts to your iDevice in a few taps.

descriptionlist.description: DISCLAIMER: I am not the creator of BytaFont. I'm simply hosting it because it's apparently only available on pirate repos.

1. Install iFonts from the AppStore (https://itunes.apple.com/app/ifont-install-any-font/id1173222289)
2. Download the font you want
3. Go to tweakmode in BytaFont and apply
4. Respring.
